official-title.#text:
To provide for the conveyance of a small parcel of
		  National Forest System land in Los Padres National Forest in California, and
		  for other purposes.

introduced

header.#text:
Land conveyance, Los Padres

			 Padres National Forest in Santa Barbara County, California, consisting of
			 approximately five acres, as shown on the map titled

all costs related
